function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accelerated adoption of non-contact teaching","Impact":"Trends in non-contact teaching could lead to increased risk of disease transmission in educational spaces","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and ventilation systems in educational facilities","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection systems, touchless fixtures","People":"Students, teachers, school staff","Owner":"School administrators, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Resident demand for community education facilities","Impact":"High demand for community education facilities could lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures, reservation systems, and regular disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Scheduling apps, disinfection robots, crowd monitoring systems","People":"Community residents, facility staff","Owner":"Community administrators, facility management"}]}
